author: Zoe Washburne
body: She's torn up plenty, but she'll fly true.

author: Willow Rosenberg
body: See, I don't get that, all this "leaving for her own good" garbage. Because that's what it is. You can't just give up because there's obstacles.

author: Martha Jones
body: I spent a lot of time with you thinking I was second best, but you know what? I am good.
